description: Ringo is still living beneath Tabuki`s house - Shoma can`t believe she is keeping it up, but still comes by to visit her. While Shoma is visiting her, Ringo gets a message on her cellphone from Tabuki, asking her out to go and watch a play with him. Ringo couldn`t be happier - until she finds out that the play`s lead actor is in fact her love rival - Yuri Tokikago.

titles.title: Colei che prepara l`elisir di Ranamore
